snippet: John Scott and his St. Thomas Choir of Men & Boys gave their first performance this season of Handel’s “Messiah” on Tuesday night.
abstract: James R Oestreich reviews performance of Handel's Messiah by John Scott and his St Thomas Choir of Men & Boys, featuring several soloists and accompanied by Concert Royal, at St Thomas Church.
lead_paragraph: John Scott and his St. Thomas Choir of Men & Boys gave their first performance this season of Handel’s “Messiah” on Tuesday night.

headline.print_headline: A Season Starts, With Fresh Sounds
headline.main: A Season Starts, With Fresh Sounds
